txt.en: Tapestries line the walls of Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nYou should examine the tapestries.
In this tapestry, Folcred and Fastred perish while fighting Haradrim and Oliphaunts at the Crossings of Poros.
In this tapestry, Eorl crosses the Anduin at the Fields of Celebrant.
In this tapestry, Frealaf defeats Wulf Frecason in Meduseld.
You have examined the magnificent tapestries lining the halls of Meduseld depicting the history of Rohan.
In this tapestry, Aldor the Old drives the Dunlendings out of the Westfold.
You have examined the magnificent tapestries lining the halls of Meduseld depicting the history of Rohan.
In this tapestry, Helm Hammerhand slays Freca outside Edoras.
(Must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras)
Meduseld has many interesting tapestries lining the walls.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Edoras quests must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras takes place.</rgb>
In this tapestry, Saruman the White receives the keys to Orthanc from Beren, Steward of Gondor.
In this tapestry, Folca the Hunter slays, and is slain by, the giant Boar of Everholt.
In this tapestry, Brytta slays the chieftain of the White Mountain Orcs.

Many great tapestries line the walls of Meduseld, depicting the history of Rohan.

You should examine the tapestries before Meduseld is emptied and locked.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Edoras quests must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras takes place.</rgb>
